017package org.apache.commons.chain.web;
018
019import java.io.Serializable;
020import java.util.Map;
021
022import javax.servlet.http.Cookie;
023
024import org.apache.commons.chain.Context;
025
026/**
027 * Extended {@link Context} that provides web based applications that use
028 * it a "generic" view of HTTP related requests and responses, without
029 * tying the application to a particular underlying Java API (such as
030 * servlets). It is expected that a concrete subclass of {@link WebContext}
031 * for each API (such as
032 * {@link org.apache.commons.chain.web.servlet.ServletWebContext}) will
033 * support adapting that particular API's implementation of request and
034 * response objects into this generic framework.
035 *
036 * <p>The characteristics of a web request/response are made visible via
037 * a series of JavaBeans properties (and mapped to read-only attributes
038 * of the same name, as supported by {@link Context}.</p>
039 *
040 * @author Craig R. McClanahan
041 * @version $Revision$ $Date$
042 */
043public interface WebContext extends Context, Serializable {
044
045    /**
046     * Return a mutable {@code Map} that maps application scope
047     * attribute names to their values.
048     *
049     * @return Application scope Map.
050     */
051    Map<String, Object> getApplicationScope();
052
053    /**
054     * Return an immutable {@code Map} that maps header names to
055     * the first (or only) header value (as a String). Header names must
056     * be matched in a case-insensitive manner.
057     *
058     * @return Header values Map.
059     */
060    Map<String, String> getHeader();
061
062    /**
063     * Return an immutable {@code Map} that maps header names to
064     * the set of all values specified in the request (as a String array).
065     * Header names must be matched in a case-insensitive manner.
066     *
067     * @return Header values Map.
068     */
069    Map<String, String[]> getHeaderValues();
070
071    /**
072     * Return an immutable {@code Map} that maps context application
073     * initialization parameters to their values.
074     *
075     * @return Initialization parameter Map.
076     */
077    Map<String, String> getInitParam();
078
079    /**
080     * Return an immutable {@code Map} that maps request parameter
081     * names to the first (or only) value (as a String).
082     *
083     * @return Request parameter Map.
084     */
085    Map<String, String> getParam();
086
087    /**
088     * Return an immutable {@code Map} that maps request parameter
089     * names to the set of all values (as a String array).
090     *
091     * @return Request parameter Map.
092     */
093    Map<String, String[]> getParamValues();
094
095    /**
096     * Return an immutable {@code Map} that maps cookie names to
097     * the set of cookies specified in the request.
098     *
099     * @return Map of Cookies.
100     *
101     * @since Chain 1.1
102     */
103    Map<String, Cookie> getCookies();
104
105    /**
106     * Return a mutable {@code Map} that maps request scope
107     * attribute names to their values.
108     *
109     * @return Request scope Map.
110     */
111    Map<String, Object> getRequestScope();
112
113    /**
114     * Return a mutable {@code Map} that maps session scope
115     * attribute names to their values.
116     *
117     * @return Session scope Map.
118     */
119    Map<String, Object> getSessionScope();
120}
